name: BackToSky
description:
"I am the true and living way"  John 14:6

BackGround:
The girl was being unconscious, a light wake her up and guide her back to the sky. Collect enough energy to fill up the light before it run out.

Way to Play:
1.press LMB to click a place where is in the light area.
2.release LMB while the cursor is in the light area to let her jump.
3.try to reach the top  as you can.

From Author:
Hope you can enjoy this short game.
